mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waiting_history ( wait_no, rcp_no, wait_dt, wait_num, waitst_cd, div_cd ) SELECT SEQ_WAITING_HISTORY.Nextval , (select a.RCP_NO from( select rownum as rnum, RCP_NO, RCP_DATE from RECEPTION order by RCP_NO desc)a where rnum = 1) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , SNUM , 'WS001' , 'DV001' FROM ( SELECT nvl(max(wait_num), 0)+1 as SNUM FROM waiting_history WHERE rcp_no = (select a.RCP_NO from( select rownum as rnum, RCP_NO, RCP_DATE from RECEPTION order by RCP_NO desc)a where rnum = 1) )
mapper.select:
with A as ( select rownum as rnum, rcp_no, pa_no from reception order by rnum desc)
select A.* from A where a.RNUM = (select max(a.rnum) from A) and a.pa_no = #{paNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select a.pa_no, a.pa_name, a.pa_reg, a.pa_hp, a.pa_sex from( select rownum as rnum, pa_no, pa_name, pa_reg, pa_hp, pa_sex from patient order by pa_no desc)a where rnum = 1

WITH T AS( select b.office_nm , c.PA_NO, c.PA_NAME, c.PA_REG ,(SELECT MAX(D.WAITST_CD) FROM WAITING_HISTORY D WHERE a.RCP_NO = d.RCP_NO) WAITST_CD , (SELECT E.WAITST_NM FROM WAIT_STATUS E WHERE E.WAITST_CD =(SELECT MAX(D.WAITST_CD) FROM WAITING_HISTORY D WHERE a.RCP_NO = d.RCP_NO)) WAITST_NM from reception a inner join doctor_office b on a.OFFICE_CD = B.OFFICE_CD inner join patient c on a.PA_NO = c.PA_NO where B.OFFICE_CD = #{officeCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) SELECT T.PA_NO, T.PA_NAME, T.PA_REG, T.WAITST_NM FROM T WHERE T.WAITST_CD = 'WS001'

select a.PA_NAME, a.PA_NO, a.PA_REG , e.OPER_TF, d.emp_no, d.emp_nm, c.trm_cd, e.disease_cd from patient a inner join reception b on a.pa_no = b.pa_no inner join TRM_CHART c on b.rcp_no = c.rcp_no inner join employee d on c.EMP_NO = d.emp_no inner join DIAGNOSIS_HISTORY e on c.TRM_CD = e.trm_cd where e.OPER_TF = #{operTf}
SELECT hspt_no, hspt_yn, hspt_in_dt, NVL(hspt_out_dt, '2023-03-17'), bed_no, wr_rno, trm_cd, disease_cd FROM hospitalization

select A.PA_NAME, B.RCP_NO, C.TRM_CD , to_char(D.HSPT_IN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') as HSPT_IN_DT, to_char(D.HSPT_OUT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') as HSPT_OUT_DT, D.HSPT_NO , D.BED_NO, D.WR_RNO,D.DISEASE_CD FROM PATIENT A INNER JOIN RECEPTION B ON A.PA_NO = B.PA_NO INNER JOIN TRM_CHART C ON B.RCP_NO = C.RCP_NO INNER JOIN HOSPITALIZATION D ON C.TRM_CD = D.TRM_CD WHERE D.HSPT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE hospitalization SET hspt_yn = 'N' WHERE hspt_no = #{hsptNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
